name: Unnamed Color Skill Game
description:
Press T to toggle Debug Stats

Press C to toggle Controller Mode

Press R to restart

Mouse and Keyboard Controls:

Left Mouse = 1st  ability

Right Mouse = 2nd ability

Shift = 3rd ability

Space = 4th ability

Controller  Controls:

Right Trigger = 1st ability

Left Trigger = 2nd ability

Left Bumper = 3rd ability

Right Bumper = 4th ability
